A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Repetition:  Impossible odds escape\, and martydom to save the Rebellion.  A half hour shorter and it would have been less blatantly obvious this is just a Disney money machine now.  Galaxy does seem it would be better off\, if the weepy Jedi were all exterminated.  If for no other reason than it would END the war this yin can't balance with it's yang.
